title: Models
htmlContent:
Models

For performing various data operations on the entities, we need to access the fields of the tables as properties of a model class. This is achieved by generating/scaffolding the POCO model classes.

Let's quickly move further towards creating model classes of the tables and views that we have creating in the database by running the below command. 


rxwebcore --models --main

After the below command is excecuted successfully, it will generate models class in the main folder of DbEntities folder of the ContosoApplication.Models project. The generated models are as below
